entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -13.2°C

Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: WSW 47 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
